#include<bits/stdc++.h>
#define mem(a,b) memset(a,b,sizeof(a))
using namespace std;
const int maxn=1e5+5,inf=1e9+7;

double use[105]={0,1.0000000,2.0000000,2.6666667,3.2500000,3.8000000,4.3333333,4.8571429,5.3750000,5.8888889,6.4000000,6.9090909,7.4166667,7.9230769,8.4285714,8.9333333,9.4375000,9.9411765,10.4444444,10.9473684,11.4500000,11.9523810,12.4545455,12.9565217,13.4583333,13.9600000,14.4615385,14.9629630,15.4642857,15.9655172,16.4666667,16.9677419,17.4687500,17.9696970,18.4705882,18.9714286,19.4722222,19.9729730,20.4736842,20.9743590,21.4750000,21.9756098,22.4761905,22.9767442,23.4772727,23.9777778,24.4782609,24.9787234,25.4791667,25.9795918,26.4800000,26.9803922,27.4807692,27.9811321,28.4814815,28.9818182,29.4821429,29.9824561,30.4827586,30.9830508,31.4833333,31.9836066,32.4838710,32.9841270,33.4843750,33.9846154,34.4848485,34.9850746,35.4852941,35.9855072,36.4857143,36.9859155,37.4861111,37.9863014,38.4864865,38.9866667,39.4868421,39.9870130,40.4871795,40.9873418,41.4875000,41.9876543,42.4878049,42.9879518,43.4880952,43.9882353,44.4883721,44.9885057,45.4886364,45.9887640,46.4888889,46.9890110,47.4891304,47.9892473,48.4893617,48.9894737,49.4895833,49.9896907,50.4897959,50.9898990,51.4900000};

int main(void){
    ios::sync_with_stdio(0);
    int t;
    cin>>t;
    while(t--){
        int n;
        cin>>n;
        cout<<fixed<<setprecision(7)<<use[n]<<endl;
    }
    return 0;
}
